sdgs.relevance:
Literacy-boosting
GOAL 4: Quality Education
Through a collaborative approach that allows children, parents and guardians to learn together.

Peace-building
GOAL 16: Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions
By substantially contributing to dialogue and creating the space and time for conversations in communities and households instead of the unfortunately common violent and inhumane practices against people with hearing disabilities.

Advocating for D/deaf Children and People
GOAL 16: Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions
We work with the D/deaf to develop our products and build platforms on which their stories reach more segments of society, decision-makers and international community.

Building an educational experience which involves parents, guardians and others
GOAL 4: Quality Education
Our content is produced with children in mind at every stage without promoting stereotypes and common biases.

Shifting the burden from women and girls
GOAL 5: Gender Equality
Through a product that can help families and communities take initiative and collaborate, instead of fully relying on the overwhelming, unpaid work women and girls are held responsible for because of certain gender-related misconceptions and norms

Filling the gap in public education
GOAL 10: Reduce Inequality
By preserving Jordanian Arabic Sign Language in the public domain as well as formal and informal education systems.

FAQs
Careers
Privacy and Policy
Amman, Jordan
 (+962) 788151122

 King Hussein Business Park, Building 23, The Tank by Umniah, King Abdullah II St.

dataPrivacySecurity.collectsPII: PII data is collected and stored but NOT distributed.

userContent.contentManagement: Content is NOT collected NOT stored and NOT distributed.

name: Martha EDU
description: Martha Education is a social enterprise interested with the innovation and development of educational tools for people with hearing disabilities, Martha’s product is the result of continuous research and learning on the best educational methodologies in Arabic-Jordanian sign language, which are multiple educational products supported with Arabic and English also an interactive application that displays a lot of visuals and videos with cartoon characters that are children-friendly and in collaboration with talented children who are talented in sign language.
openStandards:
Multimedia
SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics)
PNG (Portable Network Graphics)
JPEG (Joint Photographic Experts Group)
Ogg MP3 (Moving Picture Experts Group: Audio Layer III)
FLAC (Free Lossless Audio Codec)
H.264 (H.264/MPEG-4 AVC)
AAC (Advanced Audio Coding)
MP4 (MPEG-4 Part 14)

User Interface/ User Experience (UI /UX)
Human Centered Design Principles
Material design
